mapper.sql: TABLE_ID, PACKAGE_ID, DB_ID, TABLE_CODE, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_TYPE,TABLE_KIND, IS_TEMP, IS_PUBLIC, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_PERSON, SCAN_ID
mapper.select: select a.TABLE_ID as tableId,a.TABLE_CODE as tableCode,a.TABLE_NAME as tableName,a.TABLE_TYPE as tableType, a.TABLE_KIND as tableKind,a.IS_TEMP as isTemp,a.IS_PUBLIC as isPublic,a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, a.CREATE_DATE As createDate, b.DB_ALIAS as dbAlias, a.SCAN_ID as scanId from CRE_META_TABLE a,CRE_DB_CONNECTION b where PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.DB_ID = b.DB_ID order by a.CREATE_DATE DESC

select
,
from CRE_META_TABLE where PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by CREATE_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into CRE_META_TABLE (TABLE_ID, PACKAGE_ID, DB_ID, TABLE_CODE, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_TYPE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_PERSON) values (#{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into CRE_META_TABLE
TABLE_ID,
PACKAGE_ID,
DB_ID,
TABLE_CODE,
TABLE_NAME,
TABLE_TYPE,
TABLE_KIND,
IS_TEMP,
IS_PUBLIC,
CDT_CONFIG,
CREATE_DATE,
CREATE_PERSON,
UPDATE_DATE,
UPDATE_PERSON,

mapper.update:
update CRE_META_TABLE
PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DB_ID = #{dbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TABLE_CODE = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TABLE_TYPE = #{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TABLE_KIND = #{tableKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_TEMP = #{isTemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PUBLIC = #{isPublic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CDT_CONFIG = #{cdtConfig,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CRE_META_TABLE set PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DB_ID = #{dbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TABLE_CODE = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TABLE_TYPE = #{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.DB_ID as id,b.DB_ALIAS as name,'true' as isParent FROM CRE_META_TABLE a,CRE_DB_CONNECTION b WHERE a.DB_ID = b.DB_ID and a.PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT B.DB_ID AS "dbId", B.DB_ALIAS AS "dbAlias", B.DB_IP AS "dbIp", B.DB_PORT AS "dbPort", B.DB_TYPE AS "dbType", B.DB_SERVICE_NAME AS "dbServiceName", B.DB_USERNAME AS "dbUsername", B.DB_PASSWORD AS "dbPassword", B.IS_POOL AS "isPool", B.MAX_CONNECT AS "maxConnect", B.MAX_IDLE AS "maxIdle", B.USER_ID AS "userId" FROM CRE_META_TABLE A, CRE_DB_CONNECTION B WHERE A.TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A .DB_ID = B.DB_ID

SELECT DB_ID AS "dbId", DB_ALIAS AS "dbAlias", DB_IP AS "dbIp", DB_PORT AS "dbPort", DB_TYPE AS "dbType", DB_SERVICE_NAME AS "dbServiceName", DB_USERNAME AS "dbUsername", DB_PASSWORD AS "dbPassword", IS_POOL AS "isPool", MAX_CONNECT AS "maxConnect", MAX_IDLE AS "maxIdle", USER_ID AS "userId" FROM CRE_DB_CONNECTION WHERE DB_ID = #{dbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
